content.en: Energy optimization: Researchers have been exploring the use of algorithms, specifically deep learning models, to address various challenges in the field of electricity consumption and fraud detection. These algorithms, such as Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN), Long Short-Term Memory (LSTM), and Gated Recurrent Unit (GRU), are being used to accurately forecast energy consumption, improve fraud detection using unlabeled data, identify electricity theft users, classify home appliances, and more. By leveraging the power of machine learning and deep learning techniques, these algorithms are helping to optimize energy usage and enhance the monitoring of power grids.
content.da: Energioptimering: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af algoritmer, specifikt dybe læring-modeller, for at tackle forskellige udfordringer inden for elforbrug og svindelopdagelse. Disse algoritmer, såsom Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN), Long Short-Term Memory (LSTM) og Gated Recurrent Unit (GRU), bruges til præcist at forudsige energiforbrug, forbedre svindelopdagelse ved hjælp af uklassificerede data, identificere eltyveri, klassificere husholdningsapparater og mere. Ved at udnytte kraften i maskinlæring og teknikker inden for dyb læring, hjælper disse algoritmer med at optimere energiforbrug og forbedre overvågningen af elnet.
